hero.name: Ahmed Morad
hero.des: Building beautiful, performant, and user-friendly web applications

about.title: About Me
about.des: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer specializing in React.js with a keen eye for creating clean, efficient, and user-centric interfaces. I focus on writing maintainable code, optimizing performance, and delivering real-world solutions that make a difference. My goal is to craft digital experiences that are not only visually appealing but also highly functional and accessible.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.name: Name
contact.des: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
